html.h1: Welcome to the Home Monitor Application
html.h3: This Application was built to visualize the data which is being generated by your home router / firewall.

This application was built on Splunk to show the traffic on your network through the syslog on your cable modem router. If you need help setting up your router, please look to your provider's website for assistance.

ul.li: These views show the in bound and out bound traffic.
Make sure to configure UDP on Splunk to accept traffic via UDP port 514, if you're going to use the raw feed from your modem.
If you need assistance, please visit Home Monitor GitHub
Stay up-to-date with my blog posts here Splunk Apps by Kam
This app now supports Splunk Stream
